math::RandomUtil Class Reference
[Mathematical support classes]

#include <RandomUtil.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Utility functions for pseudo-random number generation inside various domains.


Static Public Member Functions

float3 getPointInBox (const float3 &p1, const float3 &p2)
